abstract: Both valves are inserted through a catheter. One is stainless steel and positioned with a balloon; the other has an expandable metal frame.
snippet: Both valves are inserted through a catheter. One is stainless steel and positioned with a balloon; the other has an expandable metal frame.
lead_paragraph: Both the Edwards and CoreValve heart valves offer a less invasive alternative to surgery. But the devices differ.

headline.main: Two Medical Devices, Two Different Methods
headline.print_headline: Two Medical Devices, Two Different Methods
